result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devonta L Smith

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Devonta L Smith appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Devonta L Smith.  Attorney Thomas Hasle in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded. Court took judicial notice of Waukesha case 21CF653. Sworn for the State: MPD Officer B. Riek. State rest. Defense rests. Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. Original Information received and filed; defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. Case is adjourned to Branch 11. Scheduling conference scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed: Pretrial Services Supervision Report - 10-13-22

Defendant Devonta L Smith not in court, in custody in Waukesha County.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Devonta L Smith.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case is set for a Preliminary Hearing. Defendant unable to be produced from Waukesha. Case is adjourned. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court, defendant Devonta L Smith not in court, in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Mr Smith refuses to leave his cell in Waukesha to be produced for court in Milwaukee County. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court, defendant Devonta L Smith not in court, in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. The defendant is not produced from Waukesha. Defense moves to dismiss; denied. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Devonta L Smith in court, appear by video with attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris, appear by video.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for Status. Matter was set in John Franke court for an order of show cause. Attorney Harris newly appointed. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney  in court, defendant Devonta L Smith not in court, in custody.  Patrick J Anderson appeared for Alex Geocaris the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court, defendant Devonta L Smith not in court, in custody.  Patrick J Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Harris expects to be appointed as counsel by the SPD office.    Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Prelim Court.  Status conference scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Devonta L Smith not in court, defendant in custody.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for preliminary hearing. Defendant not produced. SPD has not appointed counsel at this time. State requests an Order to Show cause hearing. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE to Br. 28.  Order to show cause hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Devonta L Smith not in court, defendant in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Defendant to be produced from Waukesha for the next date. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Devonta L Smith not in court, defendant in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Devonta L Smith in court with attorney Robert W Peterson.  Defendant Devonta L Smith in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Devonta L Smith appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Sanders, Branch 28. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
